title: Cinderella Inspired Enchanted Pumpkin Muffins
content:
With Autumn around the corner, these Pumpkin muffins are a fun and tasty treat for all the family. Disney fans will love eating their own enchanted pumpkin, just like Cinderella’s carriage! These would be great for a fun fairytale themed party, whether for Halloween or kids birthdays. 
 

 
Ingredients 
 
14oz Organic Wholewheat Flour 
 
8oz Pumpkin Puree 
 
3oz Cup melted coconut oil 
 
4oz Maple Syrup 
 
2 Organic Eggs 
 
1/4 Cup Organic Almond Milk 
 
1 Tsp Bourbon Vanilla 
 
1 Tsp Baking Soda 
 
1/2 Tsp Sea Salt 
 
1/2 Tsp Ginger 
 
1/2 Tsp Cinnamon 
 
1/4 Tsp All Spice 
 
1/4 Tsp Nutmeg 
 
Method 
 
Preheat oven to 375 F / 190C / Gas Mark 5 
 
In a large bowl, combine the pumpkin puree, eggs, milk, coconut oil, and maple syrup and beat together 
 
Add vanilla, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ginger, allspice, and nutmeg and mix thoroughly 
 
Add your flour and mix all together until evenly combined 
 
Portion your batter out into 10-12 muffin cups 
 
Bake muffins for 25 minutes or until fully cooked 
 
Remove from oven and let them cool. 
 
For the Fondant 
 
Ingredients: 
 
3 1/2 cups organic powdered sugar 
 
1/3 cup light corn syrup 
 
1/3 cup organic butter (soft) 
 
1/2 tsp salt 
 
Method: 
 
Mix corn syrup, butter and salt in a large mixing bowl 
 
Mix in powdered sugar with a soft spatula 
 
Knead the mixture together until smooth 
 Print the recipe  
Click here to download this pumpkin muffin recipe in PDF format to print easily at home
